query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS activities (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  provider VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL COMMENT 'strava, garmin, etc',
  externalId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ID da atividade no provider',
  name VARCHAR(255),
  type VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'Run, Ride, Swim, etc',
  distance DECIMAL(10, 2) COMMENT 'Distância em metros',
  duration INT COMMENT 'Duração em segundos',
  startDate TIMESTAMP,
  avgHeartRate DECIMAL(5, 2),
  maxHeartRate INT,
  calories INT,
  metadata JSON COMMENT 'Dados extras como pace, elevation, etc',
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_provider_external (provider, externalId),
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_user_date (userId, startDate DESC)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
